response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This item is not just any commodity; it holds immense value and potential for those who understand its true worth. Given its exceptional qualities, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000.

This investment could potentially lead to substantial returns and benefits tailored to your specific needs. By seizing this offer, you would be acquiring a piece that is not only valuable but also holds the promise of enriching your life or business in ways that are yet to be discovered by many.

Please consider this offer carefully, and let me know if you would like to discuss further details or have any questions regarding the product. I am here to provide all the information necessary to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
